<title level="1" right="Cantrip 3" pfs="Standard">
[Song of Marching](/Spells.aspx?ID=1774)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Composition" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=31" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 371 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 60-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You maintain a brisk performance that keeps allies on the move. You and your allies in the area can [Hustle](/Actions.aspx?ID=515) for the spell's duration, in addition to your other exploration activities (your exploration activity is Sustaining this spell). You and your allies then become temporarily immune for 1 day. If you enter an encounter while performing this song, you can use your [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) modifier for the initiative roll. You and your affected allies also receive a +1 status bonus to that initiative roll.

---
**Heightened (6th)** You can Sustain the Spell for up to 2 hours.

**Heightened (9th)** You can Sustain the Spell for up to 4 hours.
name: Song of Marching
